description.text: You have been incapacitated by the fiendish Dredmorian Nerve Pinch.
description.monsterText: incapacitates you with a Dredmorian Nerve Pinch.

description.text: You spastically fly across the room!
description.monsterText: flicks its wrist, and you fly across the room!

description.text: You are suspended in mid air!
description.monsterText: raises a hand, and you are suspended in mid air!

description.text: Your flailing has dislodged some of the equipment from your belt!
description.monsterText: twitches a finger, and you flail about, dropping some of your equipment!

description.text: You spastically make a grab for the nearest solid object!
description.monsterText: clenches a fist, and you spastically grab hold of any object around you!

description.text: You involuntarily make an obscene gesture that the entire dungeon can see!
description.monsterText: extends a boney finger, and you involuntarily make an obscene gesture that the entire dungeon can see!

description.text: Help! It's as if an irresistable force has grabbed ahold of each of your limbs and is tugging you around!
description.monsterText: points at you, and suddenly your muscles are no longer your own!

description.text: That ugly looking portrait on the wall has sensed your power and seeks to drain your valuable life essence.
You feel so funky.
He slimed me!
description.monsterText: launches a stream of pink goo directly at your face!

description.text: Your feet are stuck to the floor. In pretty much the grossest way imaginable!
Dried up mucus. Still disgusting.
Partially congealed mucus. I still wouldn't recommend touching it.
A trail of sticky mucus. You feel dirty just looking at it.
Freshly excreted mucus. Best step around if you don't want to lose your shoes.
This slimy puddle has achieved previously unquantifiable levels of viscosity and repugnance. If you were a connoisseur of mucus, you'd be quite impressed.
Gross! This creature is leaving behind a trail of sticky slime!
Gross! This creature is leaving behind a trail of sticky slime!
Gross! This creature is leaving behind a trail of sticky slime!
Gross! This creature is leaving behind a trail of sticky slime!
The enormous skull suddenly looks stronger!
description.monsterText: suddenly looks stronger!

description.text: It bites!
description.monsterText: disgorges an angry chattering skull!

description.text: With this purple haze in your eyes, you don't know if it's day or night.
description.monsterText: envelopes you in a cloud of purple smoke.

description.text: You may be blinded now, but your skin will look radiant afterwards.
Oh boy, does that sting!
description.monsterText: launches a gob of putrid venom towards your face!

description.text: Oh boy, are you on fire!
description.monsterText: unleashes a stream of hellfire in your direction!

description.text: The Kobro is crushing the life out of you!
description.monsterText: coils around you!

description.text: That no-good Kobro-Kai has disabled you with an illegal knee kick... somehow.
description.monsterText: performs an illegal knee kick.

description.text: Dear god, no!!! Not the nanoants!
description.monsterText: releases a toxic cloud of nanoants!

description.text: Watch out! It looks like it's about to hatch!
Watch out! This creature has it's eye on you!
Watch out! This creature has it's eye on you!
Watch out! This creature has it's eye on you!
Watch out! This creature has it's eye on you!
Watch out! This creature has it's eye on you!
Watch out! This creature has it's eye on you!
Watch out! This creature has it's eye on you!
You've been blinded. In pretty much the grossest way imaginable!
Grossest. Spell. Ever.
description.monsterText: launches a disgusting glob of mucus in your general direction!

description.text: Curses! Swapped again!
Did you get that thing I sent you?
Oh no, not again.
Just like me, they long to be, close to you.
Just like me, they long to be, close to you.
Just like me, they long to be, close to you.
They wish they could quit you.
Wow! Seems to be roughly 80-proof.
Bleuurghh! That tasted like turpentine!
Gross! This tastes like Kobro spit!
You feel full of pep.
You feel full of vim and vigor.
Bleuurghh! Your insides have been violently cleansed of stray thaumaturgons!
Nice shootin' tex!
description.monsterText: lights you up like a Christmas tree!

description.text: You make a hole!
description.monsterText: makes a hole!

description.text: You shot first!
description.monsterText: shoots first!

description.text: Now you're cooking with fission!
description.monsterText: shoots a blast of atomic energy!

description.text: It burns!
Your stomach rumbles, and suddenly the spirit realm looks irresistably delicious!
Your convincing portrayal of a crazy person who talks to his hand has convinced nearby monsters to back off in case it's contageous.
Your love of learning has revealed a rainbow of opportunity. But you don't have to take my word for it.
Pelted with potato parts!
description.monsterText: fires a high-velocity chunk of potato!

description.text: Caution: Warranty void if this panel is removed.
You're a bad monster! Bad! Bad!
Holy Moses, that smarts!
You hear a suspicious click!
Suddenly, new traps appear!
It's like the worst smell in the world just crawled up your nose and died.
Tiny poots of toxic spores.
You pays yer money, and you take yer chances.
You pays yer money, and you take yer chances.
You feel drained, yet hopeful.
*cough* Errr... Pay no attention to the char-broiled moron behind the curtain.
Great Scott!
Great Scott!
Great Scott!
What has been seen cannot be unseen!
Holy Moses, that smarts!
Holy Moses, that smarts!
Holy Moses, that smarts!
Holy Moses, that smarts!
Holy Moses, that smarts!
Holy Moses, that smarts!
Holy Moses, that smarts!
Holy Moses, that smarts!
Holy Moses, that smarts!
Holy Moses, that smarts!
*cough* *cough* Ummm.... This isn't what it looks like.
